title: On the trail of the torturers

description: Episode of Series "World in action". As Greece prepares for its first democratic election in a decade, "World in Action" focuses on the torturers who were recruited by the former dictatorship to "discourage" opposition. This is a powerful and confronting documentary containing graphic accounts by both the torturers and the victims of torture.
